lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the dragon takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the dragon can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: 龙能瞥见未来，所以它在攻击卷轴、能力检查和蓄力投掷方面具有优势，直到下一轮主动性计数20为止。
龙能看到的120英尺范围内的一个生物必须在一个{@dc 15}魅力测验中成功，否则就会被放逐到一个梦境，一个龙想象出来的不同的存在平面。要想逃脱，该生物必须用它的行动来做一个与龙争夺的魅力检查。如果该生物赢了，它就能逃出梦境界。否则，该效果将在下一回合的主动权计数20时结束。当效果结束时，该生物会重新出现在它离开的空间中，或者在最近的无人空间中（如果该空间被占领）。

lairActions.name: Additional Lair Action
entries: At your discretion, a legendary ({@creature Adult Gold Dragon||adult} or {@creature Ancient Gold Dragon||ancient}) gold dragon can use the following additional lair action while in its lair:

items.name: Beguiling Glow
items.entry: Warm light fills a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the dragon; each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the dragon until initiative count 20 on the next round.

regionalEffects: The region containing a legendary gold dragon's lair is warped by the dragon's magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: 每当能理解某种语言的生物在龙的巢穴周围6英里范围内睡觉或进入恍惚或沉思状态时，龙可以与该生物建立心灵感应，并在梦中与它交谈。该生物在醒来后会记得它与龙的对话。
在龙的巢穴的6英里范围内出现了美丽的、乳白色的雾岸。这些雾气不会遮蔽任何东西。当邪恶的生物靠近龙或雾中的其他非邪恶的生物时，它就会呈现出萦绕的形态，警告这些生物有危险。
在龙的巢穴1英里范围内的宝石和珍珠闪闪发光，在5英尺范围内发出昏暗的光。

regionalEffects: If the dragon dies, these effects end immediately.

regionalEffects.name: Additional Regional Effects
entries: 除了{@i Monster Manual}中描述的效果外，这些效果中的任何一种都可能出现在金龙巢穴周围的区域，或者代替这些效果。

items.name: Beneficent Trail
items.entry: 在龙穴的10英里范围内，金龙形状的小符文出现在非常需要的生物身上，标志着通往龙穴的微妙线索。

items.name: Emanation of Justice
items.entry: 在龙的巢穴6英里范围内度过一年的生物，重视公平和正义，而不是个人感情。

items.name: Liar's Revelation
items.entry: 在龙的巢穴6英里范围内，任何试图故意说谎的生物都必须在DC15魅力救赎中成功，否则就会发现自己意外地暴露了它试图掩盖的真相。第一次失败时，它将在24小时内对该效果免疫。

legendaryGroup.name: Graz'zt
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Graz'zt can take one of the following lair actions; he can't take the same lair action two rounds in a row:

items.name: Command
entries: 格拉兹兹特对巢穴中他所选择的每一个生物施展命令咒语。他不需要看到每一个人，但他必须知道有个人在巢穴中，才能以该生物为目标。他对所有的目标发出同样的命令。

items.name: Conjure Mirrors
entries: 巢穴内光滑的表面会像抛光的镜子一样反光。在使用不同的巢穴行动之前，巢穴内的生物在灵巧（{@skill Stealth}）检查隐藏时有劣势。

regionalEffects: The region containing Graz'zt's lair is warped by his magic, creating one or more of the following effects:

items.name: Agitated Beasts
entries: 巢穴周围6英里范围内的野生野兽爆发出频繁的冲突和耦合，反映了它们在交配季节的行为。

items.name: Beguiling Realm
entries: 在巢穴的6英里范围内，所有智慧({@skill Insight})检查都处于劣势，所有魅力({@skill Deception})和魅力({@skill Persuasion})检查都处于优势。

items.name: Mirrors Everywhere
entries: 巢穴周围1英里内由石头或金属制成的平面会变得高度反光，就像被打磨得闪闪发光。这些表面变得超自然地像镜子一样。

regionalEffects: If Graz'zt dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Graz'zt
lairActions: On Initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Graz'zt can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects; he can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: 格拉兹兹特对巢穴中他所选择的每一个生物施放{@spell command}的咒语。他不需要看到每一个人，但他必须知道有一个人在巢穴里，才能以该生物为目标。他对所有的目标发出同样的命令。
巢穴内光滑的表面会像抛光的镜子一样反光。在使用不同的巢穴行动之前，巢穴内的生物在灵巧（{@skill Stealth}）检查隐藏时有劣势。

regionalEffects: The region containing Graz'zt's lair is warped by his magic, creating one or more of the following effects:

items: 巢穴周围1英里内由石头或金属制成的平面会变得高度反光，就像被打磨得闪闪发光。这些表面变得超自然地像镜子一样。
巢穴周围6英里范围内的野生野兽爆发出频繁的冲突和耦合，反映了它们在交配季节的行为。
如果一个人形生物在巢穴周围1英里的范围内呆了至少1小时，该生物必须在一个{@dc 23}智慧救赎上取得成功，否则就会陷入由格拉兹兹特的疯狂表决定的疯狂状态。成功救赎的生物在24小时内不能再受到这个区域性效果的影响。

regionalEffects: If Graz'zt dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

regionalEffects.name: Madness of Graz'zt
entries: 如果一个生物在Graz'zt的巢穴中或在恶魔领主的视线范围内发疯，在Graz'zt的疯狂表上滚动以确定疯狂的性质，这是一个持续到治愈的性格缺陷。关于疯狂的更多信息，请参见{@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness}。

entries.caption: Madness of Graz'zt
rows: "世界上没有什么比我和我的欲望更重要"。
"任何不完全按照我说的做的人都不配活着。"
"我的是救赎之路。任何不这样说的人都是在故意误导你。"
"我不会休息，直到我让别人成为我的人，这样做对我来说比我自己的生命或其他人的生命更重要。"
"我自己的快乐是最重要的。其他一切，包括社交礼仪，都是微不足道的。"
"任何能给我带来快乐的东西都应该立即享受。把任何令人愉快的东西留到以后是没有意义的。"

legendaryGroup.name: Green Dragon
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the dragon takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the dragon can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Grasping roots and vines erupt in a 20-foot radius centered on a point on the ground that the dragon can see within 120 feet of it. That area becomes {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, and each creature there must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the roots and vines. A creature can be freed if it or another creature takes an action to make a {@dc 15} Strength check and succeeds. The roots and vines wilt away when the dragon uses this lair action again or when the dragon dies.

A wall of tangled brush bristling with thorns springs into existence on a solid surface within 120 feet of the dragon. The wall is up to 60 feet long, 10 feet high, and 5 feet thick, and it blocks line of sight. When the wall appears, each creature in its area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. A creature that fails the save takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) piercing damage and is pushed 5 feet out of the wall's space, appearing on whichever side of the wall it wants. A creature can move through the wall, albeit slowly and painfully. For every 1 foot a creature travels through the wall, it must spend 4 feet of movement. Furthermore, a creature in the wall's space must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw once each round it's in contact with the wall, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Each 10-foot section of wall has AC 5, 15 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, resistance to bludgeoning and piercing damage, and immunity to psychic damage. The wall sinks back into the ground when the dragon uses this lair action again or when the dragon dies.
魔法雾气围绕着龙在120英尺范围内可以看到的一个生物。该生物必须在智慧救赎中获得成功，否则在下一轮的主动权计数20之前，会被龙吃掉1%。

lairActions.name: Additional Lair Actions
entries: At your discretion, a legendary ({@creature Adult Green Dragon||adult} or {@creature Ancient Green Dragon||ancient}) green dragon can use one or both of the following additional lair actions while in its lair:

items.name: Creeper Vines
items.entry: The dragon can use the vines and roots within its lair to animate up to three Humanoid corpses, which become {@creature Zombie||zombies}. The zombies take their turn immediately after this lair action. Each one reverts to an inanimate corpse after 1 minute, when the dragon uses this lair action again, or when the zombie is destroyed.

items.name: Lashing Root
items.entry: One large root or branch that is part of the lair makes a melee attack roll against a creature within 10 feet of it. It has a +7 bonus to hit and deals 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage on a hit. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

regionalEffects: The region containing a legendary green dragon's lair is warped by the dragon's magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

entries: 灌木丛在龙的巢穴的1英里范围内形成迷宫式的通道。灌木丛就像10英尺高、10英尺厚的墙，可以阻挡视线。生物可以在灌木丛中移动，每移动1英尺就会损失4英尺的移动距离。灌木丛中的生物必须在与灌木丛接触的每一回合做一个{@dc 15}灵巧的蓄力动作，否则会受到3({@damage 1d6})的刺穿伤害。
每一个10英尺长的灌木丛都有5点攻击力，30点命中率，对打击和穿刺伤害有抵抗力，易受火灾伤害，对精神和雷电伤害免疫。

items: 在其巢穴的1英里范围内，除非它愿意，否则龙不会留下任何关于其经过的实物证据。除非用魔法手段，否则不可能追踪到它。此外，它无视这个区域内既非魔法也非生物的植物的移动障碍和伤害，包括上述的灌木丛。这些植物会从龙的路径上移开。
龙的巢穴周围1英里内的啮齿动物和鸟类是龙的眼睛和耳朵。鹿和其他大型动物奇怪地没有出现，暗示着有一个不自然的饥饿的捕食者存在。

regionalEffects: If the dragon dies, the rodents and birds lose their supernatural link to it. The thickets remain, but within {@dice 1d10} days, they become mundane plants and normal {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, losing their thorns.

regionalEffects.name: Additional Regional Effects
entries: 除了{@i Monster Manual}中描述的效果外，这些效果中的任何一种或两种都可能出现在绿龙巢穴的周围地区，或者代替这些效果。

items.name: Inviting Whispers
items.entry: 龙的巢穴1英里范围内的树叶中传来窃窃私语。这些话语模糊不清，但智力值在5分以上的生物会将其解释为对深入绿色植物的邀请。

items.name: Twisted Messengers
items.entry: 龙可以使其巢穴周围1英里内的任何小兽充当它的喉舌。其效果是可怕的，因为该生物的喉咙和嘴巴会暂时扭曲成龙的扭曲版本，以便让龙的声音发出来。

items: A powerful green hag might have the following additional lair action:

The hag creates an illusory duplicate of herself, which appears in its own space. As long as she can see her duplicate, the hag can move it a distance equal to her walking speed as well as make the illusion speak on her turn (no action required). The illusion has the same statistics as the hag but can't take actions or reactions. It can interact with its environment and even pick up and hold real objects. The illusion seems real in every way but disappears if it takes any amount of damage. Otherwise, it lasts until the hag dismisses it (no action required) or can no longer see it. If the hag uses this lair action to create a new duplicate, the previous one vanishes, dropping any real objects in its possession.
A powerful green hag creates one or more of the following additional regional effects within 1 mile of her lair:

Illusory duplicates of the hag appear in random places at random times (but never more than one in any given location). An illusory duplicate has no substance, but it looks, sounds, and moves like the hag. The hag can sense when one or more creatures are within 60 feet of her duplicate and can interact with them as if she were present and standing in the duplicate's space. If the illusory duplicate takes any damage, it disappears.
The region takes twice as long as normal to traverse, since the plants grow thick and twisted, and the swamps are thick with reeking mud.
Trees transform into awakened trees and attack when hostile intruders are near.

legendaryGroup.name: Hag
lairActions: The following lair actions are options for grandmothers and powerful aunties. Grandmothers usually have three to five lair actions, aunties usually only one (if they have any at all). Unless otherwise noted, any lair action that requires a creature to make a saving throw uses the save DC of the hag's most powerful ability.
On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the hag can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects, but can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: 在下一轮主动性计数20之前，女巫可以穿过坚固的墙壁、门、天花板和地板，就像这些表面不存在一样。

The hag targets any number of doors and windows that she can see, causing each one to either open or close as she wishes. Closed doors can be magically locked (requiring a successful {@dc 20} Strength check to force open) until she chooses to make them unlocked, or until she uses this lair action again to open them.

regionalEffects: Each hag's lair is the source of three to five regional effects; the home of a grandmother, an auntie, or a coven has more effects than the lair of a single hag, including some that can directly harm intruders. Any regional effect that requires a creature to make a saving throw uses the save DC of the hag's most powerful ability. These effects either end immediately if the hag dies or abandons the lair, or take up to {@dice 2d10} days to fade away.
The region within 1 mile of a grandmother hag's lair is warped by the creature's fell magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: 鸟类、啮齿类动物、蛇、蜘蛛或蟾蜍（或其他一些适合老鹰的生物）被大量发现。
Beasts that have an Intelligence score of 2 or lower are {@condition charmed} by the hag and directed to be aggressive toward intruders in the area.
奇怪的雕刻小人、树枝恋物癖或布娃娃神奇地出现在树上。

legendaryGroup.name: Halaster Blackcloak
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Halaster takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects:

items: Halaster的目标是在他周围30英尺内不超过4个10英尺立方体的空旷空间或固体石头，将空旷空间变成固体、加工过的石头，反之亦然。
Halaster会使他周围30英尺内的一扇门或拱门消失，取而代之的是一堵空白的墙，或者他能恢复之前以这种方式移除的一扇门或拱门。
哈拉斯特解除或重新启动地下山的一个魔法门。该门必须在他的120英尺范围内。

regionalEffects: When Halaster is in Undermountain, the following effects can occur in any location within the dungeon or in any extraplanar extension of the dungeon:

items: 一个神奇的探查传感器出现了，它的形式是一个幽灵般的、直径1英尺的人形眼睛，周围有光斑。这个传感器是静止的，尽管Halaster可以调整眼睛的方向，使其面向任何方向。哈拉斯特可以通过这只眼睛看到，就像他在它的空间里一样。这只眼睛不能被伤害或驱散，但它会在0%的时间内眨眼消失。窥视之眼会持续到Halaster结束效果为止（不需要行动）。
一个轻微的幻觉效果会被触发，就像Halaster在某个区域施放了{@spell minor illusion}。常见的幻觉包括：嘎嘎作响的铁链的回声，远处传来的爆炸性法术的声音，尘土飞扬的斗篷或锈迹斑斑的头盔漂浮在空中，就像一个{@condition invisible}的人所穿的一样，以及尘土飞扬的地板上出现的虚幻的脚印。
死去的冒险者的无声幻影在大厅和房间里飘荡，仿佛他们已经迷失。幽灵不会受到伤害，也不会以任何方式承认生物或物体。它不能被驱散，但会被压制在一个{@spell antimagic field}的范围内。

legendaryGroup.name: Hythonia
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Hythonia can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects. She can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Hythonia briefly animates creatures that have been {@condition petrified} by her gaze. Each statue attacks one creature within 5 feet of it, with a +11 bonus to hit and dealing 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage on a hit. If a Medium or smaller creature takes this damage, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).

Hythonia使幽灵蛇从她能看到的150英尺范围内的一个点喷发出来。在该点20英尺范围内的每个生物都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 19}宪法救赎，否则会受到5({@damage 2d4})的穿刺伤害，并变得{@condition poisoned}，直到下一回合结束。当{@condition poisoned}以这种方式存在时，该生物在智力检查和智力救赎上有劣势，并且它的行为就像受到{@spell confusion}法术的影响。

regionalEffects: The region containing Hythonia's lair is warped by her presence, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: 该地区居住着大量的蛇类。
Trees within 1 mile of the lair are petrified wood. Plants that stay within 500 feet of the lair for 1 day turn to stone.
巢穴周围1英里内的小水体会变成有毒的。喝了这些水的生物必须成功地进行宪法规定的投掷，否则就会在8小时内变成（1%）。受影响的生物可以在每小时结束时重复这个蓄力动作。

mythicEncounter: Hythonia serves as a potent threat against even high-level characters, but you can increase the challenge by using the Shed Skin trait. When this happens, Hythonia heals many of her wounds and slips away from danger, and then she can choose one of her mythic actions when she uses a legendary action.

You might foreshadow Hythonia using her mythic trait by describing her skin cracking and turning pale as she suffers wounds. Read or paraphrase the following text when Hythonia finally uses her Shed Skin trait:

entries: 美杜莎的皮肤裂开了，变成了毫无生气的灰色，然后破碎了！怪物崩溃了，变成了灰尘。怪物碎成了灰尘--但哗啦啦落地的不是鳞片和骨头，而是空心的石头。在美杜莎重新站起来之前，先是传来波纹状线圈的声音，她最后脱落的皮肤掉了下来，露出了闪闪发光、没有伤痕的鳞片。

mythicEncounter: Fighting Hythonia as a mythic encounter is equivalent to taking on two challenge rating 17 creatures in one encounter. Award a party 36,000 XP for defeating Hythonia after she uses Shed Skin.

legendaryGroup.name: Illithilich
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the illithilich can take a lair action to cause one of the following magical effects; the illithilich can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: illithilich掷出{@dice d8}，重新获得一个该等级或更低的法术槽。如果它没有该等级或更低的已用法术槽，则不会发生任何事情。

illithilich的目标是它能看到的30英尺内的一个生物。一条噼里啪啦的负能量绳索将illithilich拴在目标身上。每当illithilich受到伤害时，目标必须做一个{@dc 18}宪法救赎动作。如果救赎失败，illithilich会受到一半的伤害（四舍五入），而目标则会受到剩余的伤害。这种束缚一直持续到下一轮的主动性计数20，或者直到illithilich或者目标不再在illithilich的巢穴中。
illithilich会召唤出死在它巢穴里的生物的灵魂。这些幽灵会出现并攻击一个在它60英尺范围内的生物。目标必须在一个{@dc 18}体质救赎中成功，如果救赎失败，将受到52({@damage 15d6})的坏死伤害，如果成功，将受到一半的伤害。幽灵随后消失。

legendaryGroup.name: Imix
lairActions: Imix is master of heat and flames in his vicinity. He can take lair actions on the Elemental Plane of Fire, or in any elemental fire node (such as the Weeping Colossus in chapter 5). On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Imix uses his lair action to cause one of the following effects:

items: 巢穴中的任何火苗都会急剧燃烧起来，大小翻两番（例如，在5英尺乘5英尺的区域内燃烧的火苗会扩大到10英尺乘10英尺的区域）。熔岩或其他熔化物的池子或流也会受到影响。被卷入扩大的火场中的生物会受到进入火场或身处火场中的正常伤害。被突如其来的熔岩洪流卷入的生物必须成功地进行一次强度救赎，否则就会被击倒（1%），此外还受到与熔岩接触的正常伤害。
浓厚的黑烟和燃烧的余烬充满了伊米克斯120英尺范围内半径为40英尺的球体，持续到下一回合的倡议计数20。烟雾内或烟雾外的生物和物体被严重遮蔽。在一个回合中第一次进入余烬云的生物或在那里开始回合的生物会受到10({@damage 3d6})火灾伤害。

A {@item wave} of searing heat fills the lair in a 300-foot radius around Imix for an instant. Each creature other than Imix in the area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} fire damage. Creatures that take fire damage from this effect gain one level of {@condition exhaustion}. In addition, there is a fifty percent chance that any container of fluid held or carried by an affected creature (for example, a magic potion) is destroyed.

regionalEffects: The region containing an elemental node in which Imix is present becomes vulnerable to the influence of fire. This creates the following effects:

items: A dry, baking heat {@item wave} strikes the region within 10 miles of Imix's location. At first, effects are minor - grass turns brown, animals become listless, work and travel become very tiring. The longer Imix remains, the worse the heat becomes; after 5 days, crops die and ponds dry up; after 10 days, unprotected livestock dies, and wells and small rivers dry up; after 20 days, large lakes and rivers are reduced in depth by 20 feet and shrink accordingly.
野火在伊米克斯巢穴的5英里半径范围内爆发。每隔一小时，这个区域的人物有10%的机会被卷入野火的路径中，每回合移动50英尺。每个角色必须在宪法规定的救赎动作上取得成功，否则会受到10（（1%））的火灾伤害。野火会继续威胁角色，持续{@dice 1d10}个回合，或者直到他们离开它的路径。被野火烧到的木质建筑会被摧毁。

熔岩喷泉在伊米克斯巢穴1英里范围内从地面喷发出来。每隔一小时，这个区域的人物有百分之十的机会靠近喷发的熔岩喷泉，从而处于危险之中。熔岩喷泉会形成一个直径为20英尺的喷口，并将熔岩球扔到200英尺以外。在这个区域内的每个角色必须成功地进行{@dc 21}灵巧救赎，否则会受到11({@damage 2d10})的重击伤害和17({@damage 5d6})的火焰伤害。喷泉会持续{@dice 2d10}个回合才会消退。
伊米克斯巢穴1英里范围内的野火或火山裂缝会形成通往火元素界的间歇性门户，允许元素生物进入凡人世界，在这些点附近居住。

regionalEffects: If Imix is destroyed or banished back to his home plane, the regional effects fade over the next {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Juiblex
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Juiblex can take one of the following lair actions; it can't take the same lair action two rounds in a row:

items.name: Green Slime
entries: 一个{@hazard green slime}(见地下城主指南)出现在Juiblex在巢穴内选择的天花板上的一个地方。粘液在1小时后解体。

items.name: Slippery Slime
entries: 在巢穴内，Juiblex会在它能看到的地面上粘上一个方形区域。这个区域的边长可以达到10英尺。当粘液出现时，上面的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 21}的灵巧救赎中成功，否则就会跌落{@condition prone}，并向一个由{@dice d8}卷决定的随机方向滑动10英尺。当一个生物在一个回合中第一次进入该区域或结束其回合时，该生物必须做出同样的拯救。
粘液持续1小时或直到它被火烧掉。如果粘液被点燃，它将在1轮后被烧毁。任何在燃烧的粘液中开始其回合的生物都会受到22 ({@damage 4d10}的火焰伤害。

items.name: Sticky Slime
entries: 在巢穴内，Juiblex会在它能看到的地面上粘上一个方形区域。这个区域的边长可以达到10英尺。当粘液出现时，该区域内的每个生物都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 21}力量救赎，否则会变成{@condition restrained}。当一个生物在一个回合中第一次进入该区域或结束其回合时，该生物必须做同样的救赎。

只要一个{@condition restrained}的生物停留在粘稠的区域内，它就会被粘住，直到它挣脱。这个{@condition restrained}的生物，或另一个能接触到它的生物，可以用它的行动来尝试挣脱，并且必须在一个{@dc 21}的力量检查中成功。粘液持续1小时或直到它被火烧掉。如果粘液被点燃，它将在1轮后被烧毁。任何在燃烧的粘液中开始其回合的生物都会受到22({@damage 4d10})的火焰伤害。

regionalEffects: The region containing Juiblex's lair is warped by its magic, creating one or more of the following effects:

items.name: Acidic Water
entries: 巢穴周围1英里内的小水体，如池塘或水井，会变成强酸性，腐蚀任何接触它们的物体。

items.name: Corrupted Nature
entries: 在巢穴的6英里范围内，所有智慧({@skill Medicine})和智慧({@skill Survival})的检查都是不利的。

items.name: Slime
entries: 巢穴6英里范围内的表面经常被一层薄薄的粘液覆盖，粘液很滑，能粘住任何接触它的东西。

regionalEffects: If Juiblex dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Juiblex
lairActions: On Initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Juiblex can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects; he can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Juiblex slimes a square area of ground it can see within the lair. The area can be up to 10 feet on a side. The slime lasts for 1 hour or until it is burned away with fire. When the slime appears, each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or become {@condition restrained}. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there, that creature must make the same save. A {@condition restrained} creature is stuck as long as it remains in the slimy area or until it breaks free. The {@condition restrained} creature, or another creature who can reach it, can use its action to try to break free and must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength check. If the slime is set on fire, it burns away after 1 round. Any creature that starts its turn in the burning slime takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage.

在巢穴内，Juiblex会在它能看到的地面上粘上一个方形区域。这个区域的边长可以达到10英尺。粘液持续1小时或直到它被火烧掉。当粘液出现时，上面的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 21}的灵巧救赎中成功，否则就会跌落{@condition prone}并向一个由{@dice d8}卷决定的随机方向滑行10英尺。当一个生物在一个回合中第一次进入该区域或结束其回合时，该生物必须做出同样的救赎。如果粘液被点燃，它将在1轮后烧毁。任何在燃烧的粘液中开始其回合的生物都会受到22{@damage 4d10}的火焰伤害。
一个{@hazard green slime}(见地下城主指南)出现在Juiblex在巢穴内选择的天花板上的一个地方。粘液在1小时后解体。

regionalEffects: The region containing Juiblex's lair is warped by his magic, creating one or more of the following effects:

items: 巢穴周围1英里内的小水体，如池塘或水井，会变成强酸性，腐蚀任何接触它们的物体。巢穴6英里范围内的表面经常被一层薄薄的粘液所覆盖，粘液很滑，粘在任何接触它的东西上。
如果一个人形生物在巢穴的1英里范围内花费了至少1个小时，该生物必须在{@dc 18}智慧救赎上取得成功，否则就会陷入由Juiblex的疯狂表决定的疯狂状态。成功救赎的生物在24小时内不能再受到这个区域性效果的影响。

regionalEffects: If Juiblex dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

regionalEffects.name: Madness of Juiblex
entries: If a creature goes mad in Juiblex's lair or within line of sight of the demon lord, roll on the Madness of Juiblex table to determine the nature of the madness, which is a character flaw that lasts until cured. See the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness} for more on madness.

entries.caption: Madness of Juiblex
rows: "我必须消耗一切我可以消耗的东西！"
"我拒绝与我的任何财产分开。"
"我会尽我所能，让其他人吃喝超出他们的正常限度。"
"我必须尽可能多地拥有物质财富"。
"我的个性是不相关的。我是由我所消费的东西来定义的"。

legendaryGroup.name: Keresta Delvingstone
regionalEffects: Vanrakdoom is Keresta's lair, and the following regional effects are noticeable throughout it:

items: 雾悄悄地进入昏暗的光线或黑暗的区域。当光线照射到它时，它就会消失，但当光线过去时，它又会出现。在某些地区，无论光线如何，都会有永久的雾气存在，这在这些地区的描述中有所提及。
老鼠和蝙蝠的数量很多。在没有特别提到它们的地方，粪便和鸟粪出卖了它们的存在，而且可以听到它们在遥远的黑暗中不断窜动和尖叫。

regionalEffects: If Keresta is destroyed, the fog disperses, and the rats and bats gradually die off until only a scattered few remain.

legendaryGroup.name: Ki-rin
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), a kirin can take one of the following lair actions, and it must finish a long rest before taking the chosen lair action again:

items.name: Create Comforts
entries: 麒麟变出一个或多个由柔软的植物性材料制成的永久性物体--包括像枕头、绳子、毯子和衣服这样的人造物体--它们总共可以填满不超过20英尺的立方体。这些物体在1分钟后会在麒麟选择的巢穴地板上的无人空间中变现。

items.name: Create Stone and Metal
entries: 麒麟会变出一个或多个由石头或金属制成的临时物品，这些物品总共可以填满不超过2英尺的立方体。这些物体1分钟后在麒麟选择的巢穴地板上的无人空间中显现，1小时后这些物体消失。

items.name: Create Wood
entries: 麒麟变出一个或多个由木头或类似的坚硬植物材料制成的永久性物体，这些物体总共可以填充不超过10英尺的立方体。这些物体在1分钟后在麒麟选择的巢穴地板上的无人空间中变现。

regionalEffects: A ki-rin's Celestial nature transforms the region around its lair. Any of the following magical effects is possible for travelers to encounter in the vicinity:

items.name: Blessed Nature
entries: 在麒麟巢穴3英里范围内的野兽、植物和天体，随着它们向理想化的形式进化，会变得更加旺盛。这样的生物很少对通常不是猎物的其他人有攻击性。

items.name: Controlled Weather
entries: A ki-rin can cast {@spell control weather} while it is within 3 miles of its lair. The spell's point of origin is always the point outdoors closest to the center of its lair. The ki-rin doesn't need to maintain a clear path to the sky or to concentrate for the change in weather to persist.

items.name: Pure Waters
entries: 水在麒麟巢穴的3英里范围内流得很纯净。任何有目的的对水的腐蚀都不会超过3分钟。

items.name: Realm of Respite
entries: 当生物在巢穴的3英里范围内时，其身上的诅咒、疾病和毒药会被抑制，除非这些生物是异教徒、恶魔或亡灵。

items.name: Safe Descents
entries: 在巢穴的3英里范围内，风会浮起由于麒麟或其盟友的行为而坠落的生物。这些生物以每回合60英尺的速度下降，并且不会受到下降的伤害。畸形人、恶魔和亡灵不会获得这种好处，他们会像正常人一样坠落。

regionalEffects: When the ki-rin dies, all these effects disappear immediately, although the invigorating effect on flora and fauna remains for 3 years.

legendaryGroup.name: Ki-rin
lairActions: Inside its lair, a ki-rin has the power to conjure objects up to three times per day, using each of the following versions of the power once. One version permanently creates enough objects made of soft, plant-based material - including manufactured objects such as cloth, pillows, rope, blankets, and clothing - to fill a cube 20 feet on a side. The second version permanently creates enough objects made of wood, or similarly hard plant-based material, to fill a cube 10 feet on a side. The third version creates enough objects made of stone or metal to fill a cube 2 feet on a side, but any materials created in this way last for only 1 hour.
regionalEffects: The ki-rin's celestial nature transforms the region around its lair. Any of the following magical effects is possible for travelers to encounter in the vicinity:

items: 水在麒麟巢穴的3英里范围内流得很纯净。任何有目的的对水的腐蚀都不会超过3分钟。
在麒麟巢穴3英里范围内的动物、植物和善良的生物在向理想化的形式进化时获得活力。这样的生物很少对通常不是猎物的其他人有攻击性。邪恶的生物无法忍受相同距离内的神圣气氛，通常会选择住在离麒麟的领域更远的地方。
当影响善良的生物的诅咒、疾病和毒药在巢穴的3英里范围内时，这些生物会受到抑制。

A ki-rin can cast {@spell control weather} while it is within 3 miles of its lair. The spell's point of origin is always the point outdoors closest to the center of its lair. The ki-rin doesn't need to maintain a clear path to the sky or to concentrate for the change in weather to persist.
在巢穴的3英里范围内，风将非邪恶的生物浮起，这些生物不会因为麒麟或其盟友的行为而坠落。这些生物以每回合60英尺的速度下降，并且不会受到下降的伤害。

regionalEffects: When the ki-rin dies, all these effects disappear immediately, although the invigorating effect on flora and fauna remains for 3 years.

legendaryGroup.name: Kraken
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the kraken takes a lair action to cause one of the following magical effects:

items: 一股强大的水流在海怪的巢穴中流动。每个在海怪60英尺范围内的生物都必须在一个{@dc 23}力量救赎上取得成功，否则就会被推到离海怪60英尺的地方。如果成功，该生物会被推到离克拉肯10英尺远的地方。
在海怪60英尺范围内的水中生物，在下一轮主动性计数20之前，容易受到雷电伤害。
海怪巢穴中的水会带电。所有在海怪120英尺范围内的生物都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 23}宪法救赎，如果救赎失败，将受到10({@damage 3d6})的雷电伤害，如果救赎成功，将受到一半的伤害。

regionalEffects: The region containing a kraken's lair is warped by the creature's blasphemous presence, creating the following magical effects:

items: 海怪可以随意改变以其巢穴为中心的6英里范围内的天气。其效果与{@spell control weather}法术相同。
水元素在巢穴的6英里范围内聚集。这些水元素不能离开水，智力和魅力的分数为1（-5）。
巢穴周围6英里内的水生生物，如果智力分值为2或更低，则会被克拉肯吃掉，并对该地区的入侵者具有攻击性，比例为0%。

regionalEffects: When the kraken dies, all of these regional effects fade immediately.

legendaryGroup.name: Kyrilla, Accursed Gorgon
lairActions: When fighting inside her lair, Kyrilla can invoke the ambient magic there to take lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), she takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects:

items: Kyrilla casts {@spell moonbeam} (no components required). While maintaining {@status concentration} on this effect, she can't take other lair actions.
Kyrilla施放{@spell cloud of daggers}(不需要任何组件)，只是匕首是飞蛇，法术造成穿透伤害。在维持{@status concentration}这个效果的时候，她不能采取其他的巢穴行动。他指定的文化对这个效果是免疫的。
在Kyrilla 60英尺范围内的液体池涌动并起泡，溅起并浸泡在此类池子5英尺范围内的任何生物。生物如果在DC14的灵巧救赎下成功，就可以避免液体进入他们的眼睛和嘴巴。Kyrilla不能再次使用这个巢穴动作，直到她使用了另一个动作。

regionalEffects: The region containing Kyrilla's lair is warped by her accursed nature and the meteoric stone around her, which together create the following effects:

items: 巢穴中的水源被超自然地污染并有毒。喝了这些水的生物必须做一个DC14的宪法救赎动作，否则就会在1分钟内中毒。受影响的生物可以在他们每个回合结束时做一个新的自救动作，如果成功则结束该状态。
巢穴1英里范围内的植物受到钙化霉菌的影响，使叶子变干变硬，使许多本来健壮的蓟草和石楠死亡。
雾气轻度遮蔽了巢穴3英里内的土地。

legendaryGroup.name: Lich
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the lich can take a lair action to cause one of the following magical effects; the lich can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: 巫师掷出{@dice d8}，重新获得一个该等级或更低的法术槽。如果它没有该等级或更低的已用法术槽，则不会发生任何事情。
巫师的目标是它能看到的30英尺内的一个生物。一条噼里啪啦的负能量绳索将巫师与目标捆绑在一起。每当巫师受到伤害时，目标必须做一个{@dc 18}的宪法救赎动作。如果救赎失败，巫师会受到一半的伤害（四舍五入），而目标则会受到剩余的伤害。这种束缚会持续到下一回合的主动权计数20，或者直到巫师或目标不再在巫师的巢穴中。
巫师召唤出死在其巢穴中的生物的灵魂。这些幽灵会出现并攻击60英尺范围内巫师所能看到的一个生物。目标必须在一个{@dc 18}体质救赎中成功，如果救赎失败，将受到52({@damage 15d6})的坏死伤害，如果成功，将受到一半的伤害。幽灵随后消失。

legendaryGroup.name: Lichen Lich
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the lichen lich can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects:

items: Poisonous spores fill a 10-foot cube that the lich can see within 120 feet of it. Any creature that enters the cloud for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn. The cloud lasts for 1 minute or until it is dispersed by a strong wind.
巫师命令其病态丛林的力量，创造出一个晃动的土丘。晃动的土丘出现在巫师30英尺范围内的一个无人空间里，根据自己的主动数行动，并听从巫师的命令。1小时后，或者当巫师再次使用这个巢穴动作时，这个小土丘会死亡。

Rotten roots and vines magically erupt in a 20-foot radius centered on a point on the ground that the lich can see within 120 feet of it. The lich is unaffected by the roots and vines. For all other creatures, the area becomes {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, and each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the roots. As an action, a creature can try to free itself or another creature within its reach, doing so with a successful DC 19 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. The roots and vines wilt away when the lich uses this lair action again or when the lich dies.

legendaryGroup.name: Marlos Urnrayle
lairActions: If Marlos is in the earth node while {@creature Ogrémoch|PotA} isn't, the medusa can take lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Marlos uses a lair action to cast {@spell earthquake} without using components. As long as he maintains {@status concentration} on {@spell earthquake}, initiative count 20 is the start of Marlos's turn for the purpose of the spell. He can take no other lair actions while {@status concentration||concentrating} on {@spell earthquake}.
Marlos's second option for a lair action is to draw power from the earth node to heal. When he does so, he regains 30 ({@dice 6d8 + 3}) hit points.

legendaryGroup.name: Mephistopheles
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Mephistopheles can take one lair action to cause one of the following effects; Mephistopheles can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: 梅菲斯特从他的巫师列表中施放任何法术，如果它通常需要{@status concentration}，它反而会持续整个时间。
梅菲斯特用地狱之火覆盖一个5英尺的区域。任何在该区域开始回合的生物都会受到27({@damage 6d8})的火焰伤害。地狱之火会一直存在，直到梅菲斯特解除它或者他再次使用这个能力。

regionalEffects: The region containing Mephistopheles's lair is corrupted by his presence, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: Flaming winds scour the area within 2 miles of Mephistopheles's lair. Any creature with vulnerability to fire damage suffers 1 level of {@condition exhaustion} for every hour spent this close to the lair.

Within 2 miles of Mephistopheles's lair, every 60 feet of movement results in a flame geyser erupting. When a geyser appears, the creature that triggered its appearance and fails a Dexterity 22 saving throw suffers 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. Damage is halved if the saving throw is successful. The geyser remains for a day.

regionalEffects: If Mephistopheles dies, the effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Merrenoloth
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties) while captaining a vessel, the merrenoloth can take one of the following lair actions; it can't take the same lair action two rounds in a row:

items.name: Gale
entries: The air within 60 feet of the vessel is filled with wind. Until initiative count 20 on the next round, that area is {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, and when a Medium or smaller creature flies into that area or starts its turn flying there, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

items.name: Propel
entries: 强风推动船只，使其速度增加30英尺，直到下一轮的主动权数为20。

items.name: Repair
entries: 船只恢复22({@dice 4d10})点命中。

regionalEffects: A merrenoloth imbues its vessel with magic that creates one or more of the following effects:

items.name: Unerring
entries: 这艘船始终保持在merrenoloth命名的目的地的航线上。

items.name: Unsinkable
entries: 即使船体被击穿，船只也不会沉没。

regionalEffects: If the merrenoloth dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d6} hours.

legendaryGroup.name: Merrenoloth
lairActions: Any ship a merrenoloth is contracted to captain becomes the creature's lair. When fighting on the ship, the merrenoloth can invoke its ability to take lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the merrenoloth can take one lair action to cause one of the following effects; it can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: The ship regains 22 ({@dice 4d10}) hit points.
强风推动船只，使其速度增加30英尺，直到下一轮主动性计数20。

The air within 60 feet of the ship is filled with howling wind. Until initiative count 20 on the next round, that area is {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, and when a Medium or smaller creature flies into that area or starts its turn flying there, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

regionalEffects: A merrenoloth imbues its vessel with powerful magic that creates one or more of the following effects:

items: 即使船体被攻破，船也不会沉没。
这艘船始终保持着航线，前往梅里诺罗特命名的目的地。
Merrenoloth选择上船的生物不会被风或天气所干扰，不过这个效果并不能保护他们免受伤害。

regionalEffects: If the merrenoloth dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d6} hours.

legendaryGroup.name: Moonstone Dragon
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the dragon can take one of the following lair actions; the dragon can't take the same lair action two rounds in a row:

items.name: Banish into Dream
items.entry: The dragon targets a creature it can see within 120 feet of it and attempts to send that creature to a dream plane. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be banished to a harmless demiplane until initiative count 20 on the next round. While there, the target is {@condition stunned}. When the effect ends, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space.

items.name: Compulsive Dance
items.entry: 龙的目标是它在巢穴中能看到的生物，然后开始演奏只有目标能听到的欢快的华尔兹。目标必须在DC15智力救赎中成功，否则就会跳舞，直到下一轮的主动权计数20。跳舞的生物是{@condition incapacitated}，必须用它所有的动作来跳舞。

items.name: Disorienting Visions
items.entry: 迷惑性的虚幻影像在龙穴中闪现。巢穴中的每个生物都必须在DC20的智慧救赎中获得成功，否则在下一轮的主动性计数20之前，在能力检查中处于劣势。

regionalEffects: The region surrounding a legendary moonstone dragon's lair is altered by the dragon's magic, creating one or more of the following effects:

items.name: Dream Communication
items.entry: 每当能理解某种语言的生物在龙的巢穴周围6英里范围内睡觉或进入恍惚或沉思状态时，龙可以与该生物建立心灵感应，并在梦中与它交谈。该生物在醒来后会记得它与龙的对话。

items.name: Planar Transition
items.entry: 在一条月光石龙的巢穴附近，各位面之间的界限变薄了。在巢穴的6英里范围内，各种传送门连接着物质世界、精灵世界和边境虚无世界。生物可以花5英尺的移动距离通过任何方向的传送门。

regionalEffects: If the dragon dies, any portals near the lair close immediately.

legendaryGroup.name: Morkoth
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the morkoth can take one of the following lair actions:

items.name: Cast a Spell
entries: The morkoth casts {@spell darkness}, {@spell dispel magic}, or {@spell misty step}, using Intelligence as its spellcasting ability and without expending a spell slot.

items.name: Hypnotize
entries: 莫克特使用它的催眠动作，从自己120英尺内的一个点开始。它不需要看到效果的起始点。

regionalEffects: The island surrounding a morkoth's lair is warped by the creature's presence, creating the following effects:

items.name: Alter Water
entries: 只要一个念头（不需要任何行动），莫克特就可以在它的巢穴里启动一个水的变化，1分钟后生效。水可以像空气一样透气和清澈，也可以是普通的水（透明度从浑浊到清澈不等）。

items.name: Locate Creatures and Objects
entries: Morkoth知道任何新来的人，不管是物体还是生物，在它的岛上或者在它的圣地。作为一个行动，莫克特可以找到岛上的任何一个生物或物体。岛上的访客感到他们被监视着，即使他们没有被监视。

items.name: Lost Possessions
entries: 每当一个在岛上呆了不到一年的生物完成一次短期或长期的休息时，它必须做一个{@dc 10}智力拯救动作。如果失败，该生物就放错了一件物品（由玩家选择，如果该生物是该玩家的角色）。该物品仍在附近，但在短时间内被隐藏起来，因此可以通过成功的{@dc 15}智慧({@skill Perception})检查将其找回。被放错位置但没有被找回的物品会在1小时后出现在莫克特的巢穴里。如果该生物后来去了莫克特的巢穴，它丢失的物品就会在它的感知中显现出来，并且很容易被找回来。

items.name: Supernatural Lure
entries: 通往魔齿兽巢穴的入口有一种魔力，当魔齿兽在巢穴中时，它可以随时激活或压制这种魔力，而不是{@condition incapacitated}。任何在这种入口30英尺范围内并能看到它的生物必须做一个{@dc 15}的智慧救赎动作。如果救赎失败，该生物会感到一种强烈的冲动，在它的每一个回合中使用它的移动来进入巢穴，并向莫克特的位置移动（目标并没有意识到它在向一个生物移动）。目标以最直接的路线向莫克特移动。一旦它能看到莫克特，目标就可以重复蓄力，如果成功，则结束对自己的影响。它也可以在每个回合结束时和每次受到伤害时重复这个蓄力动作。

regionalEffects: If the morkoth dies, these regional effects end immediately.

legendaryGroup.name: Morkoth
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the morkoth takes a lair action to cause one of the effects described below:

items: 莫克特使用它的催眠动作，从自己120英尺内的一个点开始。它不需要看到效果的起始点。
The morkoth casts {@spell darkness}, {@spell dispel magic}, or {@spell misty step}, using Intelligence as its spellcasting ability and without expending a spell slot.

items: Morkoth知道任何新来的人，不管是物体还是生物，在它的岛上或者在它的圣地。作为一个行动，莫克特可以找到岛上的任何一个生物或物体。岛上的访客感到他们被监视着，即使他们没有被监视。

每当一个在岛上呆了不到一年的生物完成一次短期或长期的休息，它必须进行一次{@dc 10}智力({@skill Investigation})检查。如果失败，该生物就放错了一件物品（由玩家选择，如果该生物是该玩家的角色）。该物品仍在附近，但在短时间内被隐藏起来，因此可以通过成功的{@dc 15}智慧({@skill Perception})检查将其找回来。被放错位置但没有被找回的物品会在1小时后出现在莫克特的巢穴里。如果该生物后来去了莫克特的巢穴，它丢失的物品就会在它的感知中显现出来，并且很容易被找回来。
